benchmark_details.name: A streamlined Approach to Multimodal Few-Shot Class Incremental Learning for Fine-Grained Datasets
benchmark_details.overview: This paper introduces a minimalist multi-modal approach to Few-Shot Class Incremental Learning (FSCIL) that enhances separability in fine-grained datasets and introduces three new fine-grained datasets for evaluation.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To tackle the challenge of retaining knowledge while learning from limited new data streams in a parameter-efficient manner.

data.source: Three newly introduced fine-grained datasets specifically designed for Few-Shot Class Incremental Learning.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy is calculated as the average performance across multiple sessions of learning.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better performance in retaining learned knowledge while adapting to new data.
methodology.baseline_results: The method shows an average 10-point improvement over existing baselines.
methodology.validation: Results validated on three newly introduced fine-grained datasets.
